title: Front Row Center
description: IPPY Award Winner! FRONT ROW CENTER -- 2 disc mp3 CD audio book,over 40 hours in recorded length, unabridged and autographed! Their attraction was electric. Their affair explosive. And their love devastating to those around them. Despite being happily married, Taylor Allen found herself deeply attracted to singing legend and eligible bachelor Larry Davis. But, it remained a simple infatuation until she finds herself in the front row, center seat, at one of his most anticipated concerts. Their eyes meet and electricity arcs between them like a summer lightning storm. But, living a fantasy that millions of women dream of could come at a steep price.
author: Cynthia B. Ainsworthe
